name: Vanessa
description: Vanessa is a superhero fighting simulator where you fight shadow bosses. Be a cute curvy superhero girl to fight crime in this ultimate superhero fighting simulator. Sexy spider ninja girls like Dragon Gwen your step sister, trains you to fight crime and web like a spider rope hero using a grappling gun. Man, use the elastic power of spider martial arts to fight evil gangsters and stop shadow bosses in this amazing third person hero fighting game. Love one of the best superhero girl fighting games? Hot and sexy spider hero girlfriend likes to kick butt and act like an amazing spider step sister or step mom to loser villains. Be an amazing superhero girl who is fit and strong. Drag and toss bad guys from your grappling hook by shooting rope and punch them to knock them out. Vanessa got bored of dating so now she likes to fight crime instead. This is your favorite friendly neighborhood girlfriend who is not a spider hero and doesn't shoot web. Enjoy the realistic graphics of a big city with cars and citizens. Be the fighter girl who gets in ultimate boss battles. Parkour through out the city and rope swing between buildings. Play one of the best spider fighting action games which takes place in the big city filled with criminal gangs who cause trouble with police officers. This spider fighting ninja game is made for spider fans who like to play as a girl.
